articles.author: Sean Conlon, Pia Singh
articles.title: S&P 500 books back-to-back losses as tech sells off, Bank of America slides after earnings: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: The three major averages fell for a second consecutive session.
articles.content:
Stocks fell on Wednesday for a second session, pulling back further from record levels, as traders digested a fresh batch of earnings and monitored geopolitical developments.
